text: is a Japanese-born American violinist and educator. She made her debut with the New York Philharmonic at age 11 in 1982. She is seen as a child prodigy, and one of the world's best violinists as an adult. In 2007, Midori was appointed as a UN Messenger of Peace. She was elected to the American Academy of Arts and Sciences in 2012. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American violinists Category:American classical musicians Category:Academics from Pennsylvania Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Child prodigies Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Academics from California
title: Midori (violinist)
